author: CrimsonMods
name: An extended starter project for V Rising mods

postActions.description: Getting Started with V Rising Modding

manualInstructions.text: Visit https://wiki.vrisingmods.com/ and join https://vrisingmods.com/discord to chat with other modders.

description.defaultValue: Created with VRising.ModTemplatePlus, you should edit this.

UseBloodstone.description: To automatically setup and use Bloodstone.

UseBloodyCore.description: To automatically setup and use Bloody.Core.

UseVamp.description: To automatically setup and use VAMP.

HOWTO.description: Inserts tutorial-like logic into the template for learning modding
